summary: E-commerce project with product variants support. User requested currency display be changed back to USD from GBP.
architectural_notes: Currency display should be USD ($) throughout the app

new_feature_requests.summary: Replace all British Pound (£) currency symbols and GBP formatting with US Dollar ($) formatting throughout the frontend. Every place that displays a monetary value — product prices, cart totals, order totals, checkout summaries, analytics revenue figures, and any other price display — must use the USD locale format (e.g., '$12.99') consistently.

projectName: Restore currency display to USD ($) throughout the app
